abilities.description: You are unnoticed and underestimated. When you make a move to sneak, hide, or pilfer, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. When you make a move to defy expectations (decide before rolling), add +1 and reroll any dice, but count a weak hit as a miss.

Name a connection as your mentor. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.141aec8b92efd14b]{Develop Your Relationship} with them, take +2 momentum. When you successfully @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.985a5415860a99e9]{Fulfill Your Vow} in their service or to their benefit, also mark 2 ticks on your bonds legacy track. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.287bb4c2b53ea847]{Forge a Bond} with them and score a hit, make the legacy reward one rank higher (1 extra box if already epic).
When you come of age or take on a role beyond your years, gain this ability at no cost. Then, discard this asset and take two others (at no cost) to represent your new status.
